item.title: What is Machine Learning?
item.description: Since I decided to become a data scientist, I have been asked many times what data science is about and what it means to be data scientist.

item.title: Why you should watch Andrew Ng's Machine Learning course
item.description:
Where to start your data science learning journey?

Anyone interested in learning data science should at least once watch Andrew Ngâ€™s Machine Learning course on Coursera. Amongst all the training material available on the web, this is the one I find by far the most remarkable to get started in this field.

item.title: White paper about the philosophy of 'Clean Data'
item.description:
Motivation

It said that a proportion as large as 80% of data analysis is spent on cleaning the data to make it suitable for the analysis itself. This mandatory but low value-added activity diverts the analysts attention from activities that matter most: building efficient predictive models and providing insights to data that will help executives make sensitive business decisions.

item.title: GA Project week 2 - Year 2000 billboard songs analysis
item.description:
About billboard

To many, music is an art, a great source of pleasure, a way to relax.

item.title: GA Project week 1 - Analysing SAT scores across the US
item.description:
About SAT scores

The SAT is an english, paper-based standardized test widely used for college admissions in the United States. It consists of 3 parts: math, verbal and essay.
